text: Roger Machin (26 April 1926 – 17 January 2021) was a French international football referee. Machin was born in Toulon, France. He was member of FIFA in 1964–73 and refereed six international matches. Machin died on 17 January 2021 at the age of 94.L'ancien arbitre, Roger Machin est décédé ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile - eu-football.info * Profile - www.worldfootball.net * Profile - worldreferee.com Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Association football referees Category:People from Toulon
title: Roger Machin
